steps: Shut down laptop and disconnect all external devices
Remove 5 screws from bottom cover using Phillips screwdriver
Carefully pry open bottom cover starting from rear edge
Put on anti-static wrist strap before proceeding
Identify the component that needs repair or replacement
Disconnect any ribbon cables or connectors to the component
Remove screws holding component in place
Install replacement component with proper alignment
Reconnect all cables and secure mounting screws
Replace bottom cover and reinstall screws
Power on and verify system functionality
warnings: Critical: Disconnect battery before any internal modifications
Ribbon cables are extremely fragile and tear easily
Use only Lenovo-approved replacement parts when possible
Static discharge can permanently damage motherboard components
Some components may have thermal pads that need replacement
Document cable routing before disconnection for proper reassembly
Warranty may be voided by unauthorized repairs
